transcript:
Customer: Kahu kaise rata ho sanware
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, Ravijiya.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Are meri baat hui hai us team se ye jo ₹100 wala tha wo to dissolve ho gaya wo to ho gaya aapke.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Lekin isme yaar abhi bhi dikkat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kis mein?
Customer: Jo ye kya naam hai iska, Jasmine ka.
Executive: Jasmine kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Dikkat ye aa rahi hai ki jo abhi buyer team hai usse meri baat hui hai to unhone ye mere ko bataya ki jo number use hua hai jispe linkage aa raha hai client ka ye number aapko maine whatsapp pe bheja dekhiye aap jante hain kaun hai ye?
Executive: Ek minute zara ek do log karte hain ID pe na.


Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Ye to number ek hamara hi hai hamare hi number wala hi hai 761810 1042 wala.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Number to hamara hi hai ye.
Executive: Isi isi se isi se baat hui hai kaun si ID ki hai?
Customer: Are isi ki ID to yahi hai jisse ID se nahi matlab ye to number to hamara hi hai theek.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Number to mujhe un dikhaya ki unse usse baat hui hai par wo liya humse nahi hai na dikkat ye hai.
Executive: Baat baat nahi hai wo bol rahi hai ki hum log baat ko nahi consider kar rahe hain humne linkage dikh raha hai ki bylist jo hai consume kari gayi hai inki side se.
Executive: Aur koi number nahi dikha raha us pe?
Customer: Aur kisi se baat kiya hoga.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Buyer aur to bhi kisi number se baat kiya hoga.
Customer: Baat to kiya hai lekin hota hai na wo first five wala bylist usme se dikh raha hai na ye aapka.
Customer: Jaise ki main to keh hi raha hu ki buyer humse baat kiya hai to number to dikhayega hi na.
Customer: Ye bataiye.
Customer: Jab number buyer humse baat kiya rahega to number to me dikhayega hi na.
Customer: Aur usko dikkat kya hai usko sara saman mili hai theek.
Customer: Wrong product aaya wo bol rahi galat product mere ko aaya hai.
Customer: Nahi wo kya keh raha tha hum baat kiye to keh raha hume chota mila hai.
Customer: Are yaar bada kya kare wo.
Customer: Haan usko 600 chaiye tha wo samajh gaye hum.
Customer: Haan to usko jo maine dekha hai jo bata raha tha uska usme bata raha tha ki hum ₹1500 diye hain jo usko saman mila hai.
Customer: ₹1500 wala mila hai saman par usne jo photo bheja hai usko us hisab se usko ₹2000 wala saman chahiye.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aur usko kaun bheja hai wo acha ek minute rukiye to jaise usne ye mangi hello usko boliye ki jo ticket hai usse jaise hamara dekhiye hamare yahan se jayega to Rohit Enterprises likha jata hai.
Executive: Haan aur uske box pe likha bhi rahega Rohit Enterprises.
Executive: Meri jo ek ki hai shiprocket ki ID hai Rohit Enterprises ke naam se hai.
Executive: Haan theek to usse puchiye ki wo message kis kaun se enterprises se hoga na ki jisse aaya.
Executive: Haan hmm.
Customer: Are buyer team wale bahut nautanki karte hain yaar.
Executive: Ruk isliye hum humko karna hai ye to hum karenge hi lekin ye sab faltu me pareshan kar rahe hain sahi bata rahe hain.
Executive: Jaise ki hum ye keh rahe hain ki usko gaya hoga to uske paas box hoga hi.
Executive: Haan wo phone bhi to nahi respond kiye.
Executive: Jaise ki box gaya hoga to us box pe likha rehta hai kaun sa enterprises hai kis naam se aaya hai kahan se.
Executive: Hmm haan.
Executive: Agar hamare yahan se jayega rahega to dikhayega chipke pe banaras dikhata hai 117 Rohit Enterprises se ja raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan jis mein dono ID ek hi enterprises se bhejta hu shiprocket ki jo ID ek hi rahegi usme to alag alag banana nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm usme dikhayega Rohit Enterprises se aapko saman load ho raha hai message bhi jayega to.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye ek minute.

Customer: Inko bhej de sakte hain yahan se.
Customer: Dheere dheere panch saat invest kara dena.
Customer: Dheere dheere panch saat din to harvest kara dena suna.
Customer: Are ₹100 ₹200 ka aise man nuksan ho gaya uski ₹100 ₹200 rehta to main deke hata deta.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Iska jaise kya tha ye jo resolve ki kya bola hai ki resolve ho gaya.
Customer: Aur main bola tha ki mail dal denge apne side se.
Executive: Mail nahi dala hai wo hum ab check karwa liye hain kyuki aap bhej diye the paisa screenshot mil gaya to aur kya chahiye usko.
Executive: Hmm nahi to bola bhi ki hum bas baat kiye the saman ke liye hum complaint nahi dalaenge to hota hai na usse puchte hain complaint aap dalna chahte to usne wo bola hai ki main ye nahi kaha ki aap complaint kar dungi iska main nahi bola ki haan update hum iske liye to pata nahi mujhe.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo ticket automatically create ho jati hai agar kuch bhi koi select karke dalta hai na wrong product receive hua ki kya receive hua ki nahi receive hua automatic ticket ban jata hai wo.
Executive: Ab banne ko to ban jata hai usko resolve karne me hum log ki lanka lag jati hai chaliye abhi rukiye isko hum call kare thoda.
Executive: Hmm bata baat kar lijiye ki box pe kya aaya hai kya nahi aaya hai haan wahi karenge man lijiye ek to resolve ho gaya na ab isko baat karke hum karte hain.
Executive: Theek theek hai rukiye.
Executive: ₹100 wale se koi dikkat bhi nahi hoti hamare yahan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Issue with Jasmine's account still persists.

- Buyer claims to have received the wrong product.

- Buyer team is creating unnecessary issues.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the number belongs to the customer.

- Executive will call the customer to resolve the issue.

- Executive explained the process of checking the product origin.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer to resolve the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, wrong product, resolution, buyer team

seller_categories.mcat_name: Sex Toys For Men and Women
Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
